original_text: The hand of the Lord was on me there, and he said to me, “Get up and go out to the plain, and there I will speak to you.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 권능으로 거기서 내게 임하시고 또 내게 이르시되 일어나 들로 나아가라 내가 거기서 너와 말하리라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: The hand of the Lord was on me there
Get up and go out to the plain
and there I will speak to you
